A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Quite possibly the worst Star Wars movie ever made\, and I'm including the Ewok movies and the Holiday Special in that list.

A movie without any heroes\, that systematically tears down the heroes of childhood\, driven by the absurd wish by a purple haired cat lady to keep her plan for the survival of the rebellion a secret\, doesn't merit any respect at all.

Forget this movie. I wish I could.
